channel.title: Milton on Rob's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Milton on Rob's Notes

item.title: His Dark Materials
item.description: â€œInto this wild abyss, The womb of nature and perhaps her grave, Of neither sea, nor shore, nor air, nor fire, But all these in their pregnant causes mixed Confusedly, and which thus must ever fight, Unless the almighty maker them ordain His dark materials to create more worlds, Into this wild abyss the wary fiend Stood on the brink of hell and looked a while, Pondering his voyage.
